Home » 13S3 Khandhavaggasaṃyuttapāḷi » 12 Vacchagottasaṃyutta » 12.1 Vacchagottavagga
12.1.31--35 Rūpaanupalakkhaṇādisuttapañcaka
Vacchagottasaṃyutta
Vacchagottavagga
Rūpaanupalakkhaṇādisuttapañcaka
637--641.
1263Sāvatthinidānaṃ. “Rūpe kho, vaccha, anupalakkhaṇā…pe…  viññāṇe kho, vaccha, anupalakkhaṇā…pe… .
1264Pañcatiṃsatimaṃ.
